content: Note:  Wealth values are reported in 2018 dollars using personal consumption expenditures prices and averaged over each year.       Source:  Federal Reserve Board, Distributional Financial Accounts; Bureau of Economic Analysis; calculations by Board staff.   0  500,000  1,000,000  1,500,000  2,000,000  2,500,000  3,000,000  3,500,000  4,000,000  4,500,000  5,000,000  1989 2018  Figure 3.
